titleStmt.title: The speech of Mr. VVilliam Plessington, who was executed at Chester for being a priest of the Church of Rome, July 19, 1679
titleStmt.author: Plessington, William, d. 1679.

notesStmt.note: Probable place of publication from Catalogue of English broadsides, 1505-1897, 1968.
